name: CA1 field of hippocampus
description: Part of hippocampus proper bounded by CA2 and the subiculum, characterized by pyramidal neurons that receive projections from pyramidal neurons of CA3 via the Schaffer collaterals.
synonyms: ["CA1","CA1 field","CA1 field of Ammon's horn","CA1 field of cornu ammonis","CA1 field of hippocampus","cornu ammonis 1","hippocampus CA1","prosubiculum = distal ca1","regio i cornus ammonis","regio i hippocampi proprii","regio superior","regio superior of the hippocampus","region 1 of Ammon's horn","region i of ammon's horn","region i of hippocampus proper"]
